程序包 Models

类 Phases

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Models.Phases
  • public class Phases
extends java.util.Observable

    Phase

    This class that controls logic of the game

        返回:

      • extraArmyFromContinent

        public int extraArmyFromContinent​(Player player)
        Gets reinforcements from all continents that the player owns
        参数:
        player - which player to check
        返回:
        int Reinforcements that the player gets from owning the whole continent

      • reinforcementArmy

        public int reinforcementArmy​(Player player)
        Get reinforcements according to the number of countries and continents that the player owns
        参数:
        player - which player to check
        返回:
        int number of all countries devided by 3 plus army from continent

        public void startUpPhase​(Country chosen)
        Sends 1 army from current player to chosen Country during start up phase
        参数:
        chosen - Country where to send army to

      • reinforcementPhase

        public void reinforcementPhase​(Country chosen)
        Sends 1 army from current player to chosen Country during reinforcement phase
        参数:
        chosen - Country where to send army to

      • attackPhase

      • fortificationsPhase

        public void fortificationsPhase​(Country from,
                                Country to,
                                int num)
                         throws Models.SourceIsTargetException,
                                Models.MoveAtLeastOneArmyException,
                                CountryNotInRealms,
                                Models.OutOfArmyException,
                                Models.NoSuchPathException
        Sends army from one country to another
        参数:
        from - Country from where army will be deducted
        to - Country from where army will be sent
        num - int number of armies to send
        抛出:
        Models.SourceIsTargetException
        Models.MoveAtLeastOneArmyException
        CountryNotInRealms
        Models.OutOfArmyException
        Models.NoSuchPathException
